subject: Prostitution
lead_paragraph: Dennis Hof, the owner of the Nevada brothel where Odom was found unconscious, said he believed the former N.B.A. star had taken an herbal sexual stimulant while at the brothel.
snippet: Dennis Hof, the owner of the Nevada brothel where Odom was found unconscious, said he believed the former N.B.A. star had taken an herbal sexual stimulant while at the brothel.
